price: En vérité, Allah n’est point injuste à l’égard des gens, mais ce sont les gens qui font du tort à eux-mêmes.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yaẓlimu al-nāsa shayan walākinna al-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūna
